name: Noncompliant
description:
Vigo Skiff is enrolled in The Stasis Program, a shift-based lifestyle to help combat overpopulation. Everyone lives a thirty-day shift before returning to stasis while another group lives their lives for thirty days. But when the love of Vigo's life is assigned to the shift opposite his, he's determined to get her back even if it means breaking all the rules.

Noncompliant is a choice based Twine game that takes place in a dystopian future. Your choices can open up new paths and options for you to explore, including three separate endings.

There's still quite a bit I want to do with this game, so check back for future updates!
